summary: This document is an email correspondence between Jeffrey Epstein and Jes Staley discussing logistics for a car pickup at the airport. The email contains confidentiality disclaimers and indicates that the communication may be attorney-client privileged.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Epstein is coordinating travel arrangements with Jes Staley, indicating he will have Staley picked up at the airport.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Staley is receiving travel arrangements from Epstein and is involved in the discussion about car logistics.

connections.description: Epstein and Staley are coordinating travel logistics, indicating a personal or social relationship.

keyFacts: The email discusses travel arrangements for Jes Staley, including a car pickup at the airport.
Jeffrey Epstein emphasizes the confidentiality of the communication, suggesting it may be attorney-client privileged.
The email contains multiple disclaimers regarding the confidentiality and legal implications of the information shared.
